entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
